description: Essential for building and maintaining applications. Full-stack developers work on both the front-end and back-end of applications. Front-end developers focus on the user interface and user experience, while back-end developers work on the server-side logic and databases.
Designs and implements cloud infrastructure solutions (AWS, Azure, GCP). High demand due to cloud migration trends.
Analyzes data to provide insights and build predictive models.
Builds and maintains data pipelines and infrastructure.
Automates software build, deployment, and infrastructure management.
Oversees project delivery, timelines, budgets, and client communication.
Bridges the gap between technical teams and business stakeholders, gathering and defining requirements.
Designs end-to-end technical solutions for clients.
Provides expert advice on technology strategy and implementation.
Protects systems and data from cyber threats.
Creates user-friendly interfaces and experiences for applications.
Ensures software quality through testing and validation.
Provides technical guidance and mentorship to development teams.
Facilitates agile development methodologies.
Manages and maintains databases.
Implements and supports SAP solutions, a common need in European enterprises.
Customizes and maintains Salesforce CRM platforms.
Builds mobile applications.
Develops AI/ML models and algorithms.
Creates blockchain-based applications and solutions.
Designs, implements, and manages network infrastructure.
Manages and maintains IT systems and infrastructure.
Creates technical documentation for software and systems.
Manages the delivery of multiple projects.
Develops and maintains relationships with clients, focusing on sales and business development.
Develops and implements IoT solutions.
Creates reports and dashboards for business insights.
Automates business processes using software robots.
Works with large-scale data processing and analytics.
Defines the overall IT architecture for an organization.
Helps organizations manage the human side of technology adoption.
Designs secure IT systems and infrastructure.
Focuses on security within cloud environments.
Ensures data quality, compliance, and security within an organization.
Oversees day-to-day IT operations.
Develops and implements automated testing frameworks.
Manages physical and virtual IT infrastructure.
Provides technical expertise during the sales process.
Builds and maintains websites and content management platforms.
Delivers training on software and systems to employees and clients.
Provides first-level technical support.
Analyzes and improves business processes.
Manages the procurement of IT hardware and software.
A legally required role in the EU to ensure GDPR compliance.
Develops and maintains knowledge bases and information repositories.
Focuses on hiring IT professionals, crucial for a growing consulting firm.
Supports HR needs within the IT department.
Provides financial analysis and reporting for the IT department.
Oversees administrative functions within the office, important for smooth daily operations.
Provides legal advice on IT contracts, intellectual property, and other related matters.
